_source.text: After a long day of carving the various slants and slopes of Killington Mountain, nothing could be better than recharging at Killington Grand Hotel & Spa.

text: After a long day of carving the various slants and slopes of Killington Mountain, nothing could be **better** **than** recharging at Killington **Grand** **Hotel** & Spa.
